responses: Great, let's get started! What is your name?
Please provide a link(url) to your LinkedIn profile (Ex: https://linkedin.com/...)
Enter your UG cgpa as "UG CGPA:" followed by cgpa

please enter your Intermediate course "12th", followed by name of the institution, address and duration ex: (2017-2019) 
(Note: Seperate each by ",")
Enter intermediate cgpa/percentage as "12th CGPA:" or "12th Percentage:"

please enter your schooling info "10th", school name , address and duration ex: (2017) 
(Note: Seperate each by ",")
Enter your school cgpa with "10th CGPA:" or "10th percentage"
Enter programing languages as known "Programming:" each separated by a ","
Enter Web technologies known as "Webtech:" each separated by a ","
Enter Database management sytems known as "Database:" each separated by a ","
Enter Web technologies known as "Operatingsys:" each separated by a ","
Enter Certifications/Courses completed as "Courses:" each separated by a ","

Enter your project details 
 Enter title as "Title:"
Please enter the tools/technologies used in your project as "Tools used:
Please enter the description of your project as "Description:"
